languages.text: "Конечно-конечно, Звездное Сиятельство, буду чрезвычайно рад обсудить с вами все, что ни пожелаете. Однако вы проделали столь долгий и полный опасности путь! Как и любой уважающий себя хозяин, я не могу не предложить..."

traits.locale_text: "Конечно-конечно, Звездное Сиятельство, буду чрезвычайно рад обсудить с вами все, что ни пожелаете. Однако вы проделали столь долгий и полный опасности путь! Как и любой уважающий себя хозяин, я не могу не предложить..."
traits.speaker: FW_FakeGovernor

languages.text: "But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"
languages.original_text: "Конечно-конечно, Звездное Сиятельство, буду чрезвычайно рад обсудить с вами все, что ни пожелаете. Однако вы проделали столь долгий и полный опасности путь! Как и любой уважающий себя хозяин, я не могу не предложить..."

traits.locale_text: "But of course, Your Celestial Highness, it would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. However, this was such a long and perilous journey for you! As any self-respecting host would do, I must first propose—"

"But of course, Your Celestial Highness, it would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. However, this was such a long and perilous journey for you! As any self-respecting host would do, I must first propose—"

"But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

"But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

"But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

"But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

languages.text: “当然没问题，来自上界的大人！无论您对什么话题感兴趣，我都很乐意与您探讨。话虽如此，您一路奔波至此，想必已经累坏了！为了尽到地主之谊，请允许我提议——”
languages.original_text: "But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

traits.locale_text: “当然没问题，来自上界的大人！无论您对什么话题感兴趣，我都很乐意与您探讨。话虽如此，您一路奔波至此，想必已经累坏了！为了尽到地主之谊，请允许我提议——”

languages.text: 「もちろんでございます、天の閣下！ご所望の話題についてお話しできるのは、この上ない喜びでございます。ただし、閣下は長く危険な旅路を経てここにいらしたのです！誇りあるもてなし役としては、まずはご提案を差し上げねばなりますまい―」
languages.original_text: "But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんでございます、天の閣下！ご所望の話題についてお話しできるのは、この上ない喜びでございます。ただし、閣下は長く危険な旅路を経てここにいらしたのです！誇りあるもてなし役としては、まずはご提案を差し上げねばなりますまい―」

languages.text: «¡Por supuesto, su Señoría Celestial! Será un placer hablar de cualquier asunto que quiera tratar. Dicho esto, ¡ha debido de ser un largo y peligroso viaje el que le trae hasta aquí! Como buen anfitrión, debo proponerle que...».
languages.original_text: "But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por supuesto, su Señoría Celestial! Será un placer hablar de cualquier asunto que quiera tratar. Dicho esto, ¡ha debido de ser un largo y peligroso viaje el que le trae hasta aquí! Como buen anfitrión, debo proponerle que...».

languages.text: "Semavi Efendimiz! Aklınızdaki her bir konuyu görüşmek, benim için zevk olur. Bununla birlikte çok uzun ve tehlikeli bir yolculuğu henüz tamamladınız! kendine saygısı olan her ev sahibinin yapacağı üzere öncelikle size..."
languages.original_text: "But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

traits.locale_text: "Semavi Efendimiz! Aklınızdaki her bir konuyu görüşmek, benim için zevk olur. Bununla birlikte çok uzun ve tehlikeli bir yolculuğu henüz tamamladınız! kendine saygısı olan her ev sahibinin yapacağı üzere öncelikle size..."

languages.text: « Bien sûr, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Ce sera pour moi un plaisir d'échanger avec vous sur le sujet de votre choix. Cependant, votre voyage si périlleux a dû vous épuiser ! Il me faut donc, comme tout hôte qui se respecte, vous proposer d'abord... »
languages.original_text: "But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Ce sera pour moi un plaisir d'échanger avec vous sur le sujet de votre choix. Cependant, votre voyage si périlleux a dû vous épuiser ! Il me faut donc, comme tout hôte qui se respecte, vous proposer d'abord... »

languages.text: "Aber natürlich, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Ich bespreche mit Freuden alles, was Ihr vorschlagt, mit Euch. Aber hinter Euch liegt eine lange und gefährliche Reise! Ich muss Euch wie jeder anständige Gastgeber also zuerst ..."
languages.original_text: "But of course, Your Celestial Highness! It would be my pleasure to discuss whatever topic you have in mind. That said, you have had such long and perilous journey behind you! Like any self-respecting host, I must first propose—"

traits.locale_text: "Aber natürlich, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Ich bespreche mit Freuden alles, was Ihr vorschlagt, mit Euch. Aber hinter Euch liegt eine lange und gefährliche Reise! Ich muss Euch wie jeder anständige Gastgeber also zuerst ..."
